p.s: The given scene from the feature film The Hate U Give was directed by George Tillmann Jr. in 2018.
The scene is situated in the middle of the film and is used to introduce Starr's boyfriend Chris.
At the beginning of the scene Chris is walking through the hallway of the school, greatinggreeting everybody.
He walks to Starr, who is packing books from her locker.
Then he gives her his headphones so she can listen to his music.
She gives them back and they start talking seriously about their relationship.
At the end of the scene Chris takes his phone and dances to his loud music in the hallway of the school.
